item.title: About
item.description: Hi, I’m Abhinav an engineer, tinkerer and lifelong learner. Welcome to my space on the internet! I’m currently studying Computer Science and Engineering at PES University, interested in Game Development, Computer Graphics, and low level systems in general. I build to understand, and you can check out my blog (a WIP at the moment ðŸ˜…) or my Github to see some of the projects I have built.
